Package de.oth.blocklib

Class AssetManager

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.AssetManager
public class AssetManager
extends java.lang.Object
Used to load and keep track of assets located in the res-folder
Author:
Tobias Werner WiSe17/18, Sven Kalle SoSe 18

    • getTexture

      public static ModelTexture getTexture​(java.lang.String texturePath)
      Returns a cached ModelTexture for the given path, or loads it if not already loaded
      Parameters:
      texturePath - file path of the texture
      Returns:

      See Also:

    • loadImage

      public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage loadImage​(java.lang.String texturePath)
      Loads a BufferedImage without caching from the given texturePath. If the given texture path does not lead to an associated texture a fallback texture is loaded instead.
      Parameters:
      texturePath - Path to load the Image from
      Returns:
      BufferedImage containing the Image given by texturePath
      See Also:
      getTexture(String)

    • openResourceAsStream

      public static java.io.InputStream openResourceAsStream​(java.lang.String filePath)
      Opens a file as an InputStream

    • getCubeTexture

      public static ModelTexture getCubeTexture​(java.lang.String texturePath, int cubeMapType)
      Returns a cached ModelTexture for the given path of a CubeMap texture at the given path, or loads if it not already loaded
      Parameters:
      texturePath - file path of the CubeMap texture
      cubeMapType - has two proper values for two different layouts of CubeMaps. 0 is used for CubeMaps that are arranged in two rows with three pictures each 1 is used for CubeMaps that are arranged in three rows with one picture in the first and last row, and four pictures in the middle row, representing an unfolded cube.
      Returns:
      ModelTexture pointing to the texture
      See Also:
      ModelTexture

    • getModel

      public static RawModel getModel​(java.lang.String modelPath)
      Returns a cached RawModel for the given path, or loads it if not already loaded
      Parameters:
      modelPath - file path of the texture
      Returns:
      RawModel pointing to the model

    • getModelData

      public static ModelData getModelData​(java.lang.String modelPath)

      public static java.io.File[] openResources​(java.lang.String directoryPath, java.lang.String fileEnding)
      Opens all files in the directory with the given file ending

    • getMaterial

      public static Material getMaterial​(java.lang.String materialPath)
      Loads a material The type is inferred from the materialPath, which should be "assets/material/<materialType>/filename"
      Parameters:
      materialPath - Path to load the Material from
      Returns:
      Material loaded from the given .mat file
      See Also:
      MetaInfoManager
